review: i visited Doctor Sangeeta for my pregnancy consultation multiple times in recent times. *** ** **** ****** * **** **** She is more like a gurdian. She explain every bit in detail and know to comfort her patients. in past she also saved my life as i was suffering with ectopic pregnancy.

I had consulted the doctor and it was for gynaecology related. ****** *** **** ** ********** **. I am satisfied with the explanation and treatment given. I can surely recommend doctor to my family or friends circle. There was no waiting time in the hospital. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. I had done tests outside and took reports. I had UTI issues and joint pain post covid. Walking was suggested. Hospitality was good

I had visited the hospital and it was gynaecology related. ********* *** **** ** ******* I am satisfied with the explanation given by the doctor. I would like to recommend the doctor to other people. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. Tests was done outside. There was less waiting time in the hospital when we went. Diet and exercise was suggested. Doctor was friendly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The doctor simplyfy the situation instead of complicating it. Does not put weird ideas in your head and takes the simpler but more effective route to recovery.

I have rescheduled appointment for myself and visited the hospital. ****** *** ***** check up had done, medicine was suggested to take. There was no waiting time and positive response from the staff. Over all the experience was good and I would like to recommend this doctor for others also.

She is very open to answer all the questions answer by the patients its always good to know the root cause of disease *** **** ********** *** *** **** ** **** ** *** **** ***** **** ***** ** ******* ***********
